title: Somethings wrong with my patch again
body: Ok this has again happened my Launcher has crashed completely and wont open in any way, ive done a full uninstall and now trying to reinstall but im failing miseribly please I need help on** how to get this fixed **

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you running Avast antivirus? If so you'll need to [add an exception for league](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/45htrv/fix_for_lol_launcher_not_opening_21216/).

If not please let me know so we can explore further solutions.

Okay ive reinstalled it and allowed the exception but it wont load the launcher to begin the download i have also deleted everything from all my previous patches to start a clean reinstall but nothing
I've been running Avast long before I ever had League (2014 installed) ill try again its only begun happening today after the last year since the crash

Hi,

This thread may help you, http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/8sVhOttr-solution-to-log-on-client

I had 7 LoL patchers in there in my secondary antivirus system it wasnt Avast it was my Windows firewall Defender blocking the access through my anti backdoor system i recently put in apparantly it works the same way Thank you both for your help{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
Glad the issue has been resolved :)
